devices_included: Public display; Tabletop, large horizontal display
contribution_desc: The paper presents a deployment of a multi-display environment, CollectionDiver, for searching in library collections that combine a large touch display with an interactive table with tangibles. The study demonstrates that CollectionDiver makes search easier to understand, promotes active approaches to search, has a transparent process and facilitates a shared experience. The CollectionDiver employs a horisontal search display with tangible filter tokens and a vertical result display. The study was conducted in-situ at the library.
